Class ServiceCollectionExtensions

Cheetah.Kafka.Extensions
Assembly
Cheetah.Kafka.dll

Extension method for adding Cheetah Kafka client factory to IServiceCollection

public static class ServiceCollectionExtensions
Inheritance
object
ServiceCollectionExtensions

Methods

AddCheetahKafka(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration, Action<ClientFactoryOptions>?)

Registers and configures a KafkaClientFactory with the provided configuration for dependency injection, along with its required dependencies.

public static ClientInjector AddCheetahKafka(this IServiceCollection serviceCollection, IConfiguration configuration, Action<ClientFactoryOptions>? configure = null)

Parameters

serviceCollection IServiceCollection

The IServiceCollection to register the KafkaClientFactory and its required services with.

configuration IConfiguration

The IConfiguration instance to use for configuration.

configure Action<ClientFactoryOptions>

Optional action to configure Kafka behavior

Returns

ClientInjector

The supplied IServiceCollection instance for method chaining.

Remarks

This method requires that the KafkaConfig section is configured in the supplied IConfiguration instance.
